DataElement.preferredName: Platelet Transfusion Prior Grade 2 Platelets Chimeric Antigen Receptor T-cells Administration Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of last platelet transfusion prior to recovery of platelets to less than or equal to grade 2 within 6 weeks of CAR-T cell administration.
